text: Pete Edochie is a Nigerian actor and Igbo culture practitioner. Pete is the father of Yul Edochie. ==Biography== Pete is a Native of Nteje but was born in Zaria, Kaduna State. ==Controversies== He was abducted by Kidnappers who remained unknown and was later released in 2009. ==Reference== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian actors Category:People from Anambra State
title: Pete Edochie
